img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy forest environment. Three characters, equipped with weapons and wearing armor, are engaged in combat with a large humanoid creature. The characters appear to be using a combination of melee attacks and possibly magic, as indicated by the glowing effects on their weapons. The game interface displays various icons and a health bar at the bottom of the screen, suggesting the player's current status and available actions. The text "Non-Able" is visible, possibly indicating a game mechanic or status effect.
